SEARCH
Module comp3111.examsystem
Package comp3111.examsystem.controller

Class StudentQuizController

java.lang.Object
comp3111.examsystem.controller.StudentLoginController.StudentId
comp3111.examsystem.controller.StudentQuizController
All Implemented Interfaces:
Initializable
public class StudentQuizController extends StudentLoginController.StudentId implements Initializable
Controller for managing the student quiz interface. Handles quiz functionality including navigation, timer, and grading.
